user.title: Configure HomeKit Device Aggregator
user.description: Choose a name and type for your aggregated device

device_config.title: Configure Device Entities
device_config.description: Select the entities to combine into a single HomeKit device

device_descriptions.kettle: Combines power control, temperature settings, keep warm functionality, and monitoring into a single HomeKit kettle
device_descriptions.thermostat: Creates a thermostat with multiple temperature sensors and controls
device_descriptions.fan: Combines fan controls (power, speed, oscillation, direction) into one device
device_descriptions.light: Aggregates light controls (power, brightness, colour) into a single light
device_descriptions.humidifier: Combines humidity sensing and control into a smart humidifier
device_descriptions.air_purifier: Creates an air purifier with air quality monitoring
device_descriptions.garage_door: Combines door controls and sensors into a garage door opener
device_descriptions.security_system: Creates a security system from multiple sensors and controls

entity_descriptions.power_switch: Main power control for the device
entity_descriptions.countdown_timer: Shows remaining time for the current operation
entity_descriptions.keep_warm_idle_time: Sets how long to maintain the keep warm temperature
entity_descriptions.water_level: Monitors the water level in the device
entity_descriptions.air_quality: Shows the overall air quality reading
entity_descriptions.filter_life: Monitors the air filter's remaining life
entity_descriptions.pm25: Shows the PM2.5 particulate matter level
entity_descriptions.voc: Shows the Volatile Organic Compounds level
entity_descriptions.door_position: Controls and monitors the door position
entity_descriptions.obstruction: Detects obstructions in the door's path
